alert.note: Alert for Divide (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:06AM CST until February 22 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Divide County. * WHEN...Until Midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerous wind chills could return Tuesday night, and likely remain through the end of the week.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
